RelatedSentence: Bloemfontein - The trial of a man accused of taking part in a rightwing coup plot will resume in the Bloemfontein High Court on Monday .
On Thursday , the State closed its case against treason accused Johan Prinsloo .
Prosecutor Torie Pretorius handed a list of admissions to the court the accused had made , in agreement with his legal counsel Johann Nel .
Prinsloo , 51 , of Springs in Gauteng , faces charges of treason , conspiracy to take part in terrorist acts , and possession of illegal ammunition .

Prinsloo allegedly attempted , between July 2012 and December 16 , 2012 , to overthrow the government by trying to obtain mortar bombs and other weapons to attack President Jacob Zuma and Cabinet ministers during the conference .
